feature.label: iSphere Lpex Editor Extensions (optional)
feature.description: The "iSphere Lpex Editor Extensions" feature adds options for commenting and uncommenting source lines to the Lpex editor as well as options for indenting and unindenting source lines. It is mainly intended to be used with WDSCi but you can also install it for RDi, if you want to get the same actions and behavior for both development environments. RDi 8.0+ uses Ctrl+/ and Ctrl+\ for commenting and uncommenting source lines, whereas WDSCi 7.0 lacks these options. Both development environments have no shortcuts for indenting and unindenting source lines.
